Sql.CDATA:
-- table UsrPMCostReassignmentPercentage IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = N'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = N'UsrPMCostReassignmentPercentage') BEGIN PRINT 'Create table UsrPMCostReassignmentPercentage' CREATE TABLE [dbo].UsrPMCostReassignmentPercentage( [CompanyID] [int] NOT NULL ,[PMReassignmentID] [nvarchar] (15) NOT NULL ,[TranID] [bigint] NOT NULL ,[ReassignmentSelection] [char] (1) NOT NULL ,[SourceValue] [decimal] (19,4) NOT NULL ,[DestinationValue] [decimal] (19,4) NOT NULL ,[Percentage] [decimal] (19,4) NOT NULL ,[NoteID] [uniqueidentifier] NULL ,[CreatedByID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL ,[Tstamp] [timestamp] NULL ,[CreatedByScreenID] [char](8) NOT NULL ,[CreatedDateTime] [datetime] NOT NULL ,[LastModifiedByID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL ,[LastModifiedDateTime] [datetime] NOT NULL ,[LastModifiedByScreenID] [char](8) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT [PK_UsrPMCostReassignmentPercentage] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [CompanyID] ASC, [PMReassignmentID] ASC, [TranID] ASC ) WITH ( PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON ))
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignmentPercentage] WITH NOCHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_PMTran_UsrPMCostReassignmentPercentage] FOREIGN KEY([CompanyID], [TranID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[PMTran] ([CompanyID], [TranID]) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignmentPercentage] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_PMTran_UsrPMCostReassignmentPercentage]
END
